title: Devasena Diamond Haaram: A Symphony of Tradition and Brilliance
materials: Crafted in 22K Gold with Hyderabadi Polish for a lustrous finish. Adorned with meticulously selected VVS clarity diamonds. Features a vibrant Ruby at the necklace's apex and an Emerald at the base of the pendant
features: This exquisite Haaram showcases a classic floral motif interwoven with intricate diamond settings. The central pendant features a grand rosette design, accented by a vibrant green Emerald. The necklace strand features alternating floral and circular motifs, creating a harmonious and elegant design. The pendant and motifs are connected through complex filigree work, exemplifying superior craftsmanship.
colors: Predominantly gold and shimmering white diamonds
punctuated by the rich red of the Ruby and the vibrant green of the Emerald. This traditional color combination symbolizes prosperity and good fortune.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions such as weddings (Vivaha Mahotsavam)
and other significant life events. Its timeless design also makes it a cherished heirloom for future generations. Ideal for Muhurtham
description: This Diamond Haaram is a testament to timeless elegance and superior craftsmanship. The combination of exquisite diamonds, vibrant gemstones, and traditional Hyderabadi polish makes it a truly unique and valuable piece. The intricate design and attention to detail showcase the artistry of our master jewelers. Its cultural significance and symbolic value make it a perfect choice for those seeking a piece with meaning and heritage.
